div.bibl: Saloniki, March 29, 1924, p. 1 GREEK CELEBRATION OF NATIONAL HOLIDAY.

body.p: In all the Greek Orthodox churches of Chicago the double ceremony of Annunciation and National Regeneration was held with great reverence, last Sunday.

At the cathedral of St. Constantine, where bishop Philaretos officiated, the celebration was magnificent and brilliant. Hon. Matlis Consul General of Greece, and his staff, officially participated and delivered the panygric oration of the day.
